title: College dilemma
content: I got cse in pes rr campus via pessat and will get bms cse via kcet due to the increase in number of seats and have obc quota ..... which college shall I choose as fees is not a problem and why?

comments.body:
This may not be the direct answer you are looking for but, Decide for yourself, what will play out better.  
You need to see which outcome would play out best for you, As both these colleges are pretty different.

Based purely on colleges, PES RR would be a better pick in terms of academics and placements ( also infrastructure and campus ) , that is if fees isnt an issue. But kcet fees is really less and you could consider BMS as well. Also scholarships do exist in PES but u will still be playing slightly more than KCET
Search the subreddit, BMS CS (CET) vs PES CS (PESSAT) has already been discussed. TLDR - pick BMSCE.

If money is not matter, PES RR CSE is far better option than BMS

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vksZAOa1wtU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vksZAOa1wtU)
man ew stop recommending his videos
What is wrong in that video? I can see all the points are absolutely correct
